mean_cn: adj. 小巧的，小型的，袖珍的，体积小的；紧密的，紧凑的，密集的；  v. 把……压紧；变得坚实；  n. 带镜小粉盒
mean_en: smaller than is usual for things of the same kind; using or filling only a small amount of space
sentence: Smartphones are the most compact computers; they're much smaller than laptops.
sentence_trans: 手机是最小巧的电脑，它们比笔记本电脑小多了。
word_etyma: com共同 + pact压紧 → 全部压紧 → compact紧密的
